articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Nepal becomes first South Asian country to officially register same-sex marriage - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Constitution of Nepal, adopted in 2015, explicitly states that there can be no discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation. | World News
articles.content:
Five months after the Supreme Court legalised it, Nepal on Wednesday formally registered the first case of same-sex marriage, making it the first South Asian country to do so.
